weekly_top_story.headline: Senate Passes Funding Bill Extending Telehealth, Regulating PBMs
weekly_top_story.summary: The Senate passed critical legislation extending telehealth flexibilities and imposing regulations on pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs), averting long-term disruptions in access to virtual care and drug pricing amid a partial government shutdown.

stories.headline: After three weeks of declining cases, influenza levels rose this week and remain elevated across the United States
stories.summary: CDC reports a resurgence in influenza cases after a decline, with elevated flu, high RSV, and COVID-19 activity in parts of the U.S., signaling heightened respiratory virus risks for patients and healthcare systems.

stories.headline: House Rules Committee meets today to consider Senate changes to funding bill amid partial shutdown
stories.summary: The House is poised to vote on Senate modifications to the government funding bill including HHS appropriations and health extenders, potentially resolving the partial shutdown affecting healthcare operations.
